article_title: Monopoly, Menthol Pose Hurdles to Any Reynolds-Lorillard Deal
article_text:
Cigarette makers Reynolds American Inc. and Lorillard Inc. will face some impediments should they decide to combine, in particular, antitrust concerns and uncertainties about a possible U.S. crackdown on menthol flavoring.

That is why many analysts and investors aren't sold yet on the idea that the two companies will combine any time soon—if ever. The stocks of both companies fell Thursday as those realities set in. The shares had...
